title: Two days, two walk-offs for Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson - MLB.com
content: Two days, two walk-offs for Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson  MLB.com
description:
On Friday night, Texas Tech shortstop Kurt Wilson played the role of hero for the Red Raiders with a walk-off steal of home against their intrastate rivals, the Texas Longhorns. On Saturday, he followed up his heroics in grand fashion.
